I’m deeply grateful to everyone who pitches in what they can to our campaign. Together, we can put power in the hands of working people and make our government work for all of us. Join us: http://ewar.ren/Chip-In https://twitter.com/TeamWarren/status/1230300413825605633 QT @TeamWarren #TeamWarren update! 🚨

We’ve officially raised more than $1 million just on social media this month! That’s the power of grassroots donors. 

Thank you to everyone who’s in this fight for @ewarren all the way. Chip in $2 now to keep up the momentum. https://secure.actblue.com/donate/soc-socmilestone?refcode=soc-FR-team-tw-crowd-20200219

Yesterday, I was proud to host a gathering on Black maternal health with groups fighting to ensure that Black mothers have the support they need.

Black women are facing a maternal mortality crisis―we must act. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERLEvlcWsAIQI1g.jpg

While Mike Bloomberg was blaming Blacks and Latinos for the 2008 financial crisis, I was holding hearings with families in Nevada who were losing their homes. I have a record of fighting for working families—and winning. #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERMAMtpXkAQW0JG.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1230326981721456640/vid/320x320/_LBN2FCo9C4oT174.mp4?tag=13

This is about leadership and accountability. When Mayor Bloomberg apologizes for stop and frisk, he talks about how it turned out. The problem is what it was designed to do to begin with: Target communities of color and Black and Brown men from the start. #DemDebate

Yesterday I told Chris Salcedo on @newsmax I hope we see a thorough investigation into #BurismaBiden. On the face of it, there is an awful lot of evidence of corruption. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1230231172556476426/img/r6M95zMqPvoHb5RH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1230231172556476426/vid/480x270/uqywXQjy7W3aaYQG.mp4?tag=13

Real change never takes place from the top on down.

Real change never takes place from an oligarchy controlled by billionaires.

We need to mobilize millions of people to stand up for justice.

Please join us. #DemDebate

This view makes no sense. Do you object when a student uses a Pell grant to attend Norte Dame? Or the GI Bill to go to BYU? If it’s OK for 18-yr-olds, why not 17-yr-olds? Don’t discriminate against religious faith—which is what the Supreme Court will hold—and let students decide. https://twitter.com/nytopinion/status/1230129998717227010 QT @nytopinion "I do not want my tax dollars spent subsidizing someone else's religious education, and I am a believer," writes John from Illinois in a comment on "School Choice Logic Doesn’t Apply Here. Does the Supreme Court Get That?" https://trib.al/kyF49qn http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERJMtveWAAEyAoI.png

What utter nonsense. Its NAME is “Bloomberg News.” He literally owns it. There is no stronger supporter of Israel or foe of antisemitism in the Senate; instead get the House to pass my resolution (passed Senate 100-0) calling out Left-wing antisemitic comments of your colleagues. https://twitter.com/repandylevin/status/1229939497669996550 QT @RepAndyLevin Words matter. Owning the media outlet carrying this message is indeed a problem. However, accusing a Jewish candidate of owning “the media” is anti-Semitic. https://twitter.com/tedcruz/status/1229919334539186177
@pfpicardi @WhoopiGoldberg Thank you! We’re all in this together 💕

An informed electorate and an elevation of our civil discourse can only strengthen our society. It was a pleasure to sit down with @ChrisEvans and @MarkKassen to discuss the need for U.S. global leadership, our nation’s debt, and climate change for their project, #AStartingPoint. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERJw2cJXkAMFdEc.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERJw2cVW4AEEhm-.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERJw2cUWkAENg37.jpg

Also, billionaires don’t have a billion dollars because they “work” thousands of times harder than the teacher or the single mom.

They are billionaires because the stock market makes that money for them, which relies on profiteering off insulin, low wages, scrapped jobs, etc.

Let's level. Medicare for All will save tens of thousands of lives and $450 billion every year. #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1230321377850413056/img/UHfLwXh9l7nJYuPR.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1230321377850413056/vid/480x270/lYMR3E5c1a0X7haK.mp4?tag=13
Mike Bloomberg has more wealth than the bottom 125 million Americans. That’s wrong and immoral. #DemDebate

Yes, let’s talk about pensions - like how private equity groups load a ton of risk from unethical practices on the pensions of teachers, nurses, & public servants - so that when a bubble pops, it’s working people that are left holding the bag.

https://theintercept.com/2018/10/20/public-pensions-crisis-wall-street-fees/ https://twitter.com/chsommers/status/1230347862208282624 QT @CHSommers Can someone tell her about pensions. https://twitter.com/aoc/status/1230334453978992640

Today in 1942, FDR signed the executive order that led to the internment of approximately 120,000 people of Japanese ancestry. We can’t erase this shameful part of our nation’s history—but I co-sponsored a bill last year to prevent atrocities like this from ever happening again.

These official outlets from #China are instruments of government action in the U.S.. Requiring them to register as Foreign Missions is welcome and long overdue. 

https://www.wsj.com/articles/state-department-names-five-chinese-media-outlets-as-foreign-diplomatic-missions-in-u-s-11582062002

Last week, Trump proposed a budget that is a disaster for hardworking Americans. And now, Republicans on the Senate Budget Committee refuse to even hold a hearing on it.

It's critical that we have a public discussion about what’s in it. The American people deserve nothing less.

For 100 years, we have been talking about the need to guarantee health care for all. Now is the time to take on the greed of the health care industry once and for all. #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1221142365139849217/img/akGldmN1t3Y1NRIY.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1221142365139849217/vid/480x270/8-olpLIrkLEdHtYq.mp4?tag=13

America’s workers have always had to fight for economic fairness & basic human dignity on the job. A minimum wage. Workplace safety protections. A 40-hour workweek. Now it’s time to fight for #SchedulesThatWork.

I'll fight for your family just as hard as I've fought for my own. #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERMUgpXWsAULhSj.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1230348049643450368/vid/320x320/YN21UqLyovI-aoOX.mp4?tag=13

Detroiters are having their water shut off because they can’t afford outrageous water bills. Meanwhile, Nestle gets to bottle unlimited amounts of water for a few hundred bucks a year. That is a moral outrage. Clean water must be a human right. https://www.bridgemi.com/michigan-health-watch/i-hate-complain-i-havent-had-water-year-detroit-story

I'm the proud daughter of a janitor, and I went on to be a public school teacher, a law professor, a senator—and a candidate for president.

I’ll never forget who I’m fighting for. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERKf-58XYAAPBDq.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1230219451280347136/vid/480x270/CJi_d7YUV5nnaotm.mp4?tag=13

I believe in science.

And I believe that one way we're going to deal with the climate crisis is by increasing by tenfold our investment in science. I have a plan for that. #DemDebate https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/green-manufacturing
This is a question of values. Do we want to invest in Mayor Bloomberg, or in an entire generation of young people? #DemDebate

On my first day as president, I will sign an executive order to stop all new drilling and mining on public lands and offshore drilling. We cannot continue to let our public lands be used for profits. #DemDebate

I hope you heard what Mayor Bloomberg’s defense of decades of mistreatment to women was: “I’ve been nice to some women.”

That just doesn’t cut it. #DemDebate

78 years after fear, hate, and division led to the signing of Executive Order 9066, California will formally apologize for its role in the internment of Japanese-Americans. We must never repeat these mistakes. #DayOfRemembrance https://www.nytimes.com/2020/02/18/us/japanese-internment-camps-apology.html

This week, some candidates are hosting closed-door fundraisers that cost $75,000 a ticket.

Not me. I’m in Nevada—meeting voters, talking with community leaders, and taking questions.

How we fund our campaign matters. Will you donate $2 now? https://secure.actblue.com/donate/soc-febfr?refcode=soc-FR-ew-tw-mic-20200219

Donald Trump has no problem pardoning white collar criminals.

Meanwhile, hundreds of thousands of Black and Brown Americans are sitting in jail because of marijuana convictions or because they can't afford bail.

That injustice is what we're going to end.

A year later, I introduced the Corporate Executive Accountability Act to force CEOs of companies like Equifax and Wells Fargo to take responsibility for their actions. If you’re in charge of a company that breaks the law & millions get hurt, you should face jail time.

Black moms die from childbirth-related causes 3-4 times more often than white moms. We have a Black maternal mortality crisis, and racism is at the root of it. I’ve got a plan to address this head-on. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERKXQScXkAAKE3C.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1230211296752291845/vid/480x270/gr6Wg1issQKwt6gg.mp4?tag=13

Chip in $2 and I could give you a call tomorrow to say thanks. https://secure.actblue.com/donate/soc-feb20fr2?refcode=soc-FR-ew-tw-debate-20200219
A majority of Americans—Democrats, independents, and Republicans—support my #WealthTax on all fortunes above $50 million. #DemDebate https://elizabethwarren.com/wealth-gap

We’ve got a housing crisis in this country & working families are getting crushed by skyrocketing costs. So I’ve got a bill to invest in 3.2 million new housing units, reduce rents by 10%, & create 1.5 million jobs. We can do this. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1105860042912419842/img/Trnfyx-Tk7AapzWC.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1105860042912419842/vid/320x180/pQvtl_1L9PjWKGrI.mp4?tag=11

Let’s talk about electability. A multibillionaire who supported George W. Bush in 2004, who said we shouldn't raise the minimum wage, who wanted to cut Social Security — that’s not electability. #DemDebate

I also introduced the most ambitious anti-corruption bill since Watergate to lock the revolving door between Wall St & Washington. Banks shouldn't be able to pre-bribe employees to work for the govt & regulators shouldn't spend their time in office auditioning for their next gig.

ICYMI I gave Chris Salcedo my take on Senate Democrats’ meeting with Foreign Minister Zarif: I’m much more concerned that Democrats support Obama’s policy of giving $$ to Iran to fund terrorism, to try to kill Americans, to make us less safe. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1230230281682112514/img/1WncEP1IsN_NAJkW.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1230230281682112514/vid/480x270/rku9wZq4UFWrPc3m.mp4?tag=13

Working families are." http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1230170701069508610/pu/img/O-EoUpF_P2OjGvU5.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1230170701069508610/pu/vid/480x270/oLBls2sjgq5xM-Pp.mp4?tag=10

We need real accountability for big Wall Street banks – and the people who run them. So on the 10th anniversary of the financial crisis, I introduced the Ending Too Big to Jail Act to put big bank executives in handcuffs when their banks break the law.
Great news for #FortLauderdale! @USDOT has awarded $20 million to fund a runway extension at @FLLFlyer. #FLL

UCSC grad students are fighting to have their labor rights acknowledged. I strongly urge the president of the UC system to stop threatening them, especially immigrant students, for organizing. I stand with @payusmoreucsc

My #SchedulesThatWork Act would set some ground rules for retail, fast food, & other hourly workers’ schedules:
❌ Workers should get their schedule 2 weeks in advance
❌ No retaliation for requesting schedule changes
❌ Workers have a right to rest between shifts

These steps are badly needed to counter propaganda by the Chinese Communist Party, which for years has been distributed as “news.” I recently joined @SenTomCotton & other colleagues calling for investigations into such organizations related to the Foreign Agents Registration Act. https://twitter.com/axios/status/1229892593527480323 QT @axios Exclusive: Mike Pompeo tells Axios that the new designation of five Chinese state media outlets as arms of the Chinese government is "long overdue."

WATCH: Ted Cruz Shreds Bernie, AOC Bill To Ban Fracking https://www.dailywire.com/news/watch-ted-cruz-shreds-bernie-aoc-bill-to-ban-fracking/

RT @billmckibben Thank you @AOC. This is one of the few vital lessons for everyone to understand--and the hardest for most politicians to take on board. https://twitter.com/AOC/status/1230329248885460992 QT @AOC Fracking is NOT a transitional fuel, and it is dangerous to say so.

Fracking emits methane, which is about **84 TIMES** more powerful than CO2 in contributing to climate change for a generation.

This is not a joke. We either commit to the science or not.
https://www.nationalgeographic.com/science/2020/02/super-potent-methane-in-atmosphere-oil-gas-drilling-ice-cores/

I'd like to talk about who we're running against: A billionaire who calls women “fat broads” and “horsey-faced lesbians.” And no I'm not talking about Donald Trump. I'm talking about Mayor Bloomberg. #DemDebate

Of all the people on the #DemDebate stage, I’ve been a politician the shortest—but I've been the one out fighting for families the longest. As President, I'll fight for your family as hard as I fight for mine. #DemDebate

#Rosneft has singlehandedly helped #MaduroRegime steal the resources of #Venezuela to fund the corruption that holds the regime together. These new sanctions prove pressure will only increase until democracy  is restored.

Trump’s proposed budget includes:
→$170 billion in cuts for college affordability programs
→$76 billion in cuts for federal disability benefits
→Cutting the EPA budget by 26%

It’s no wonder Senate Budget Committee Republicans don’t want to hold a hearing on his budget.

Maybe it's time for the working class to have a little bit of power instead of Pete Buttigieg's billionaire donors. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1230314144630497282/img/YUYsoLIAXAI2GLQ6.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1230314144630497282/vid/480x270/9J3vXyl7DLF_JXLq.mp4?tag=13

Enough is enough. No one should have to beg for money to get the health care they need in the richest country on Earth. We will fight back.

Stay strong out there, @Culinary226—I’m fighting alongside you all the way! https://twitter.com/Culinary226/status/1230191450672906240 QT @Culinary226 💥Station Casino workers are rising up and organizing because they want to be treated fairly. 

Thanks @ewarren for coming to the @palms picket line and standing in solidarity with workers who are fighting for a contract. #1job http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERKEjvLUEAANGPL.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERKEjvMU0AA8JYW.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERKEjvoU0AAL338.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERKEjvMUEAA5VBL.jpg

This country has worked for the rich and left everyone else in the dirt for too long. It’s time to have a president who is willing to get out there and fight for working families. That’s why I am in this race. And that’s how I will beat Donald Trump. #DemDebate

Mayor Bloomberg has made women—dozens, who knows—sign nondisclosure agreements for sexual harassment and gender discrimination.

Mr. Mayor, are you willing to release all of those women from those nondisclosure agreements so we can hear their side of the story? #DemDebate

There’s a startup gap between white entrepreneurs and Latino entrepreneurs. The principal reason is that Latino entrepreneurs don’t have the equity to get businesses started. I have a plan to put $7 billion in a fund to help people who are routinely cut out. #DemDebate

I want to make sure that environmental justice gets more than a passing mention. I have made a commitment to invest a trillion dollars to repair the damage that this nation has permitted to be inflicted on communities of color. We have to own up to our responsibility. #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERMUMRmWAAA2_Ba.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1230348032203460608/vid/320x320/kQ7Cf6cfRGHEIfHP.mp4?tag=13

This is how they did it. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DaH-_P9WkAEnS8d.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/982345297933332483/vid/240x240/AWKWx91ON8gjaC97.mp4?tag=2

The Walton family is the wealthiest family in America with a net worth of nearly $200 billion. It's time for the Waltons to end their greed, pay a living wage of at least $15 an hour and treat all of their workers with the dignity and the respect they deserve. https://twitter.com/AnetaMolenda/status/1229773105305989122 QT @AnetaMolenda Walmart associates are descending on Alice Walton’s penthouse in New York City RIGHT NOW to demand living wages and a fair workweek at Walmart.

Walmart is the biggest private employer in the country. They can afford to do better. 

#WakeUpTheWaltons #MakeBillionairesPay http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1229772970052243457/pu/img/BRWFa87iqWPcsVCA.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1229772970052243457/pu/vid/320x568/EZmrTmnpFhncFQL8.mp4?tag=10

The fight to #KeepTexasRed starts with YOU. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce53yrdpv/90xrv

We can't simply talk about climate change in big, global terms. We have to own up to our responsibility. We need to talk about it in terms of rescuing the communities that have been damaged. #DemDebate

Dream big. 
Fight hard.
Let’s win.

I’m fired up for tonight’s #DemDebate in Las Vegas. Will you chip in $2 to our campaign now? We’re doing this together, person by person. https://secure.actblue.com/donate/soc-febfr?refcode=soc-FR-ew-tw-cheer-20200219

This is not just a question of Mayor Bloomberg’s character—it’s a question about electability. We’re not going to beat Donald Trump with a man who silences women with who knows how many nondisclosure agreements. That's not what we do as Democrats. #DemDebate

On this Day of Remembrance, we must acknowledge when President Franklin D. Roosevelt signed an order to unjustly incarcerate 120,000 Japanese Americans during World War II. It comes upon us to call out our government’s legacy of racism and injustice—and keep fighting against it.

If you want to issue a real apology, then it has to start with the racist intent of the plan, and the willful ignorance of admitting what was happening even as people protested in your own streets. You need a different apology here, Mr. Mayor. #DemDebate

While Mike Bloomberg was blaming Black and Latino families for the 2008 crash, I was in Nevada—literally down the street from where we’re standing tonight—holding hearings on how Wall Street was ripping homes away from millions of people. #DemDebate
Let’s be clear: We need to get rid of the filibuster. If you're not willing to roll back the filibuster, then you're giving the fossil fuel industry a veto. #DemDebate

Does anyone really think that a Republican billionaire who supported George W. Bush, wanted to cut Social Security and Medicare and opposed raising the minimum wage is going to defeat Donald Trump? #DemDebate http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ERMShxzXsAEjZVg.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1230336100008366080/vid/320x320/taDpMiXODND0vv8C.mp4?tag=13
Here’s a radical idea: The person with the most votes should be the Democratic nominee. #DemDebate

Small businesses are the heart of our economy, but it's getting harder to start and grow one—and the challenges are even greater for communities of color. I've got a comprehensive plan to boost America's small businesses. https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/small-businesses?source=soc-WB-ew-tw

Brandon, I’m in this fight for you, Drew, and Juan. We will build a better America, together. https://twitter.com/bjoewolf/status/1230235994823254018 QT @bjoewolf I’m in this because I dared myself to believe in @ewarren ‘s America.
